Antonio Rodríguez de las Heras Pérez (19 September 1947 – 4 June 2020) was a Spanish historian. He was a professor at the Charles III University of Madrid. He was Dean of the Faculty of Humanities, Communication and Documentation and Director of the Institute of Culture and Technology of the Carlos III University. He was also a member of the Advisory Council of TeamLabs from 2013 until his death. He was born in Vigo, Spain.
Rodríguez de las Heras died on 4 June 2020 in Madrid from COVID-19, aged 72.
